## FieldLabel.setClass() method

Set the CSS class applied to the field's textElement\_.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setClass(cssClass: string | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cssClass | string \| null | The new CSS class name, or null to remove. |

**Returns:**

void
